name: Osprey Talon 11 Backpack - Men's
description:
If you have an affinity for quick rips along single track or afternoon hikes to your favourite viewpoint, this pack is for you. The Talon 11 holds just the essentials when you're moving fast and light on the trails. The AirScape backpanel is cool and airy on hot days, and plenty of easily accessible pockets keep snacks close at hand.Mesh-covered die-cut foam hipbelt, shoulder straps and back panel are lightweight and let air flow through to your back.Seamlessly integrated lumbar pad and hipbelt transfer weight without rubbing.Stretch-mesh pockets on the shoulder strap, hip belt, sides and front are easy to access on the go.Stow-on-the-Go trekking pole attachments and helmet holder give you multi-sport gear carry options.External hydration sleeve accommodates a 3L reservoir (sold separately).

        Sustainability
